categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide fiction

nodes.text: Street Drama is a roleplaying adventure outline in the September 1996 Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide, published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game as part of the Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire multimedia project. The adventure pits bounty hunter characters against condemned Roolek clan Rodians on a chase through the city of Iskaayuma on the planet Rodia, culminating in a confrontation at the Rodmark Weapons Plant, a secret Roolek stronghold.
